title: Xiaomi wants to put an end to extracting APKs on Android, but Google doesn’t
content:
Xiaomi, one of the biggest phone manufacturers in China, wants to prevent APKs from being extracted from Android devices, but thankfully Google disagrees with the idea.

more…

The post Xiaomi wants to put an end to extracting APKs on Android, but Google doesn’t appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Xiaomi wants to prevent APKs from being extracted from Android devices, but thankfully Google disagrees with the idea.
